name: Man Of Sorrows
description:
Some people are born with sorrows and live like that. Some people cannot...

In this game you will try to live as a programmer with "a lot of sorrows"... But that's not all. You have some... issues... You see things you shouldn't. Fortunately, the doctor is helping you. He adds more pills to your prescription. The doctor is helping you! He is trying to fix you! He adds more and more pills to your prescription ! Pills make life easier for you !!!

Developed for Quarantine Jam 2020

How to play

Character movements W A S D  

Erase the imaginary black hands with your follower light beam by attacking left mouse button

There are Sorrow limits for everything that can be interactable. Character will not perform the action if that limit is passed.

There are 2 different endings, both of them are bad endings. Your goal is to survive as much as possible. Do not sleep with 100 Sorrow or do not take damage if your health is 0.

If Hunger is 100, any action that increases Hunger will decrease Health !

If you do not take your daily medications, imaginary hands spawn more often.

You can use computer that in your bedroom to make money. Job points increase your basic earnings for the company works. 

You need to develop a game at least 3 times before complete and publish it.

You can buy Supply from the market.
